## Importing raw data

```{r}
# Code chunk
user_1_info_file <- here("data-raw/mmash/user_1/user_info.csv") 

user_1_info_data <- read_csv(
  user_1_info_file,
  col_select = -1,
  name_repair = snakecase::to_snake_case
)

spec(user_1_info_data)
user_1_info_data <- read_csv(
  user_1_info_file,
  col_select = -1, # col skip (deletes the column)
  col_types = cols(
    col_skip(),
    gender = col_character(),
    weight = col_double(),
    height = col_double(),
    age = col_double()
  ),
  name_repair = snakecase::to_snake_case
)

spec(user_1_info_data)
```
